title: Jordan Bourke's Pineapple, sweetcorn and chilli salsa

ingredients.item: 2 red chillies, deseeded and finely chopped
Â½ x 28g pack fresh coriander, roughly chopped

instructions.step: Put the pineapple, shallot, sweetcorn, chillies and coriander in a bowl with the lime juice, season and mix together. Keep chilled until ready to serve.
